jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Psychiatric/Mental Health Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Psychiatric / Mental Health Registered Nurse (RN) is responsible for providing nursing care for patients of all ages with mental illness or mental distress. The Psychiatric RN will assess patients, write a care plan, monitor progress, and work alongside a team of mental health professionals and medical staff that includes social workers, psychiatrists, therapists, and physicians.  1+ year of recent Psychiatric/Mental Health RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & Nights
